abstract: The moves were announced at a shareholders’ meeting where the Toyota president, Akio Toyoda, apologized for recalls tied to faulty accelerator pedals and floor mats.
snippet: The moves were announced at a shareholders’ meeting where the Toyota president, Akio Toyoda, apologized for recalls tied to faulty accelerator pedals and floor mats.
lead_paragraph: TOYOTA CITY, Japan  For years, the combined salaries of the president of Toyota Motor and the 38 members of its board have been smaller than the single salary of some top executives at car makers in the United States and elsewhere.

headline.main: After Tough Year, Pay Cuts and Forfeited Bonuses for Top Toyota Executives
headline.print_headline: After Tough Year, Pay Cuts and Forfeited Bonuses for Top Toyota Executives
